title: Give low prioty queue on a game I was there for
body: My laptop ran out of power faster than it should have so I had to get my charger and maybe was gone for a minute and was then there for the rest of the game and won us it but I was still punished for no reason

replies.body: Returning to a game may still count as a leave, as there is a period where you are not participating in the match.  This can still cause a negative experience for players; though, your return is certainly appreciated!  Your standing with [Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&query=leaverbuster)will improve through consistent uninterrupted play, and will get you out of lower priority queue.  I recommend using that time to troubleshoot anything that could cause you to leave a match.

It was just my computer going down because I forgot my charger and it toke less than a minute to correct the mistake and get back into the game. That shouldn't have triggered leave buster and even though it was a bot game that went well ever with out me, I left at about one minute and came back before 3 and was able to continue the game fine.
